Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Paradis in Paris (Gare du Nord - Gare de L'Est), you'll be minutes from Folies Bergere and Grand Rex Cinema. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Paradis in Paris (Gare du Nord - Gare de L'Est), you'll be minutes from Folies Bergere and Grand Rex Cinema. This hotel is close to Louvre Museum and Notre Dame Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Folies Bergere - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Grand Rex Cinema - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Porte Saint-Denis - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Paris Museum of Freemasonry - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Le Palace Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Passage Verdeau - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grevin Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Porte Saint-Martin - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Hotel Drouot - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Paris Bourse - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Opera Comique - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Passage du Grand Cerf - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Arts et Metiers Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Galerie Vivenne - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place des Victoires - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Paris (ORY-Orly) - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle) - 21.7 km / 13.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Paradis is Paris (CDG-Roissy-Charles de Gaulle).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
